explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a black platform is set up on the right side of the gray floor. On the right side of the platform, there is a wall erected with black panels. A man is standing on the platform, wearing a Spiderman mask and suit, along with a pair of socks with yellow dots. Several yellow pillars protrude from the wall in front of him.

[0-4] The man walks forward, then reaches out his right hand to grab a yellow protrusion. Afterward, the man turns to face the wall and extends his left hand to grab another protrusion. Subsequently, he slowly moves to the left. The man uses his right hand to grasp the protrusion held by his left hand, then grabs another protrusion on the left wall with his left hand. As the man's left hand grasps the protrusion, a yellow pillar pops out, without hitting him.
